metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stored-self XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/zones.php of ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code in a vulnerable field via a crafted Zone NAME to the index.php?view=zones&action=zoneImage&mid=1 URI.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
